bugs.description: Recipe detail modal has poor back button visibility. The back button appears in top-left with insufficient contrast against the dark green modal header background.

specifics.contrast_issue: Insufficient contrast, button text 'Terug' barely visible

bugs.description: Recipe detail modal overlays on top of recipe list content, creating z-index layering that obscures background content. Modal backdrop opacity may be too light.

specifics.backdrop_opacity: Background content visible through modal overlay

bugs.description: Branding 'Slow-Carb Companion' appears on every screen header. While consistent, this creates visual repetition that could be streamlined.

specifics.recommendation: Consider abbreviating or removing on sub-pages

bugs.description: Header to main content spacing appears minimal. The green '0 dagen on protocol' card sits very close to the header, reducing breathing room.

specifics.spacing_issue: Insufficient top padding/margin between header and content

bugs.description: Recipe title 'Krokante Kip Drumsticks' in modal header may be cramped on smaller screens. Title, prep time, and cook time all compete for space in the header area.

specifics.text_cramping: Header contains title + metadata + back button + favorite icon
specifics.recommendation: Consider stacking or increasing header height

bugs.description: Recipe cards show consistent layout but favorite/heart icons on the right may overlap with card content on narrower viewports.

specifics.potential_overlap: Heart icon positioned at absolute right
specifics.responsive_concern: May clip recipe metadata on mobile

bugs.description: Settings page sections (Profile, Voorkeuren, Data & Privacy) have good spacing, but the header 'Slow-Carb Companion' and 'Dag 1' create a busy top area.

specifics.visual_clutter: Header branding + day indicator takes significant vertical space
specifics.recommendation: Consider condensing header on settings page

bugs.description: Shopping page 'Ammo Check' card has good visual hierarchy, but expandable section indicators (chevrons) could be more prominent.

specifics.usability_issue: Chevron icons on right may not be immediately obvious as interactive
specifics.recommendation: Consider larger chevrons or hover states

bugs.description: Learn page has dense content with multiple color-coded sections. While informative, vertical spacing between sections could be improved for readability.

specifics.spacing_issue: Sections like 'De 5 Regels', 'Quick Reference', 'CHEAT DAY' are tightly packed
specifics.recommendation: Add 24-32px vertical spacing between major sections

bugs.description: Meal cards (Ontbijt, Lunch, Avondeten) have consistent styling but the circular icon + title + subtitle creates a dense layout that may feel cramped.

specifics.text_density: Icon + heading + description all in single row
specifics.recommendation: Consider stacking elements or increasing card height

bugs.description: Day selector pills (ma, di, wo, etc.) have good visual feedback for selection (orange highlight), but inactive days have low contrast gray text.

specifics.contrast_issue: Inactive day labels are light gray on light background
specifics.accessibility_concern: May not meet WCAG AA contrast ratios

bugs.description: Modal tabs (Ingrediënten, Bereiding) use underline for active state, but the active tab indicator is subtle and may not be immediately obvious.

specifics.recommendation: Use bolder underline or background color for active tab

primary_concerns: Text contrast and readability (medium to low)
Responsive design concerns for recipe cards (low)
recommendations: Improve back button contrast in modal headers
Review and standardize spacing between header and main content
Add more vertical spacing in dense content areas (Learn page)
Consider responsive breakpoints for recipe cards and meal cards
Review color contrast for accessibility compliance
